Name: Merry Scarf
LongDescription: Uses the Pickup ability to make it easier to find items. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Zigzagoon and Linoone.  Finding a Merry Scarf at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
